text.0: o agni be our nearest friend be thou a kind deliverer and a gracious friend.
text.1: excellent agni come thou nigh to us and give us wealth most splendidly renowned.
text.2: so hear us listen to this call of ours and keep us far from every sinful man.
text.3: to thee then o most bright o radiant god we come with prayer for happiness for our friends.
